DOC.brief_summary: This observational survey study will capture all renal transplant patients in Serbia who are currently receiving CellCept (mycophenolate mofetil) as part of their immunosuppressive protocol.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of CellCept (Mycophenolate Mofetil) in Renal Allograft Recipients
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, >/= 18 years of age Recipients of renal allograft Patients receiving CellCept
